subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Tampa Bay put the exclamation point on the Red Sox’ collapse, as Evan Longoria hit a walk-off home run in the bottom of the 12th to win the A.L. wild card, moments after Boston fell to the Orioles.
snippet: Tampa Bay put the exclamation point on the Red Sox’ collapse, as Evan Longoria hit a walk-off home run in the bottom of the 12th to win the A.L. wild card, moments after Boston fell to the Orioles.
